description: This interface defines the board support driver for AC power path: ControlPilot, Relais, RCD and motor lock

three_phases.description: true: Three phases enabled, false: only single phase

has_ventilation.description: true: Allow mode D charging, false: do not allow mode D charging

country_code.description: A two-letter country code in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format

rcd_enabled.description: true: enable RCD, false: disable RCD

enable.description: Enables or disables the EVSE. Typically disabled results in control pilot state F. It must not accept cars for new charging sessions if disabled.

pwm_on.description: Turns PWM on with duty cycle

pwm_F.description: Turns PWM off with Error F (constant negative voltage)

allow_power_on.description: Sets allow_power_on flag. If false, Relais must never be switched on.

value.description: True: allow power on, false: do not allow power on.

switch_three_phases_while_charging.description: Special command to force switching between one and three phases while charging is active. HW must go through some special sequence to ensure safe operation.

value.description: True: switch to 3ph, False: switch to 1ph
